items.sentence: Was everything that happened between us a lie?
I thought Tom wouldn\'t mind waiting for Mary.
Did you see the cowboy movie on TV last night?
Do you always have coffee with your breakfast?
Do you know what time Tom usually goes to bed?
Do you plan to join us for a drink afterwards?
I don\'t know where he is or what he\'s doing.
I don\'t know why someone else can\'t do this.
Please tell me your name and telephone number.
You are fortunate to have such loving parents.
You make mistakes if you do things in a hurry.
I couldn\'t understand why she frowned at him.
I did a week\'s worth of work in an afternoon.
I didn\'t buy anything at the duty-free shops.
Tom refused to give Mary the money she needed.
Tom regrets telling Mary his telephone number.
Tom retired a couple of years before Mary did.
Tom rolled up his sleeves and started working.
Tom rose to his feet and walked to the window.
Tom doesn\'t want to do anything to hurt Mary.
